entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
